desc: Moussem is empowering women artisans in Morocco by bringing their handmade, expertly crafted rugs to your home. The team source directly from weavers spread across Morocco’s mountainous regions, ensuring that they receive a fair price and re-establishing the craft as a viable career for these talented young women.

layout.text: Preserve the collective Amazigh heritage by empowering female artisans in Morocco ⵣ
